name: templates-common-library
description: Contains reusable utilities for all ArcGIS Instant apps

scripts.build:amd: tsc && npm run generateTypes:amd && npm run filesCopy:amd
scripts.prepare: npm run build:amd && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:run:test: npm run build:test && npm run run:test
scripts.filesCopy:amd: npx cpy ./amd/package.json ./dist && npx cpy ./README.md ./dist && npx cpy ./src/structuralFunctionality/telemetry/telemetry.dojo.min.js ./dist/structuralFunctionality/telemetry && npx cpy ./src/configParamsJSON ./dist/configParamsJSON
scripts.filesCopy:esm: npx cpy ./esm/package.json ./distESM && npx cpy ./README.md ./distESM  && npx cpy ./src/structuralFunctionality/telemetry/telemetry.min.js ./distESM/structuralFunctionality/telemetry && npx cpy ./src/configParamsJSON ./distESM/configParamsJSON

author: Cameron Smith (c.smith@esri.com)
